 2009-19882009-12-10,  ,  CRA,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectScott Franko Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits tax in the amount of $2,169.00, $3,755.90 and $1,636.65 for the 1989, 1990 and 1991 tax years, respectively, and all relevant interest on that tax, a penalty of $292.81 for the 1989 tax year and all relevant interest on that penalty, and all remaining arrears interest for the 1990 tax year, paid or payable under Part I of the Income Tax Act by SCOTT FRANKO.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0119 Publication Date: 2009-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
